results.description: A dynamic application that uses mySql, Express and Express Handlebars
An application the harnesses Node.js and MySQL to manage a businesses Employees, Departments, Roles and Budget
Nerd_Book provides Coding Camp Students a platform to share who they are and their talent to other student coders
An application that harnesses Express to create and save a users notes
Pandemic UI is an interactive application that utalizes API's to display real time  statistics and the most rescent news articles related to the Corona-Virus outbreak

Weather Dashboard is built in HTML5, CSS and jQuery, and provides current weather and 5 day forecast for any city around the world. Users city search is validated and history is stored in the users local storage
An application that harnesses React to dynamically build an employee directory. Users will be able to search for users by name in order to filter the directory
